value:
You are the best, Summoner!
Hey, you can call up all sorts of
different Heroes, right?$k$pSo can you summon a friend to
play with me? Someone who can
turn into a dragon, like I can!

I used to live in a place that was
somewhere in the Deeprealms.$k$pAlmost all that time, I couldn't fight
at all, but now I can use a sword.
And a dragonstone too!

Thanks for saying hi. Let's play a
game when you're done with work.
I'll get lots of other people too!

Next time we battle, you should hop
on my back when I'm a dragon!$k$pI know you don't usually go onto the
battlefield with us, but then you
could. We'd never lose!

Don't tell Mama that I play catch with
my dragonstone. See? Sparkles really
neat when I toss it in the air!

Oh, hey! It's really you, isn't it,
$Nu!$k$pI've come to say hi for your friend
$Nf!

Think I'll ever be as strong as
Mama?
Look! Did I do it right?
I'll try harder. I promise.

Thanks for that. You're really
kind, just like my Mama.

Hi. It's good to meet you! I'm Kana.
My mama is Corrin. I can turn into a
dragon and then, wow, can I fight!

Hey, Mama! Look what I—wait,
you're $Nu,
not my mama!$k$pThat was a funny mistake to make!
I wonder what made me think you
were Mama? You don't look like her...$k$pI guess it's just 'cause I love you just
like I love her. Did you know that?
It's true!$k$pYou always wanna play with me, and
you also show me what to do in our
battles.$k$pI'm practicing all the time to be even
better in fights—have you noticed?
Have you seen how strong I am?$k$pYou just watch—I'll keep you safe
with my dragon powers forever!
えいっ！
でえいっ！
わあっ！
Ow ow ow!!
We won't give up!
You won't stop me!
I'll protect everyone!
Just like Mama!
Mama...
Heehee
Thanks for coming to play with me!
I'm really good at using my dragon powers. I'll show you soon!
This whole place is kinda weird, isn't it?
My Mama is really strong. I wanna be just like her.
You have one of those div...divine weapons? Oh, neat!
I wonder where Mama is... Wait, she hasn't gotten lost, has she?
You just watch. I'm going to grow into the strongest one around here. And then I'll keep you safe!
OK!
Do my best!
Hi!
